---
title: "Infer rsID if not readily in summary statistics"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
df_ref = read.table("auxfiles/SNPref_PGC3_SCZ_wave3.european.autosome.public.v3.vcf.tsv", header=T)
df_stats = read.table("Stroke/AnyStroke/MEGASTROKE.1.AS.EUR.out", header = T)
```

```{r}
df_merged = merge(df_stats, df_ref, by.x = "MarkerName", by.y="ID")
```
